name: kline-fetcher
description: Fetches historical candlestick (K-line) data from Binance perpetual futures. Output includes OHLCV data in compact CSV format: Open price, High price, Low price, Close price, Volume, and quote volume. Data is optimized with relative timestamps and compact representation for LLM token efficiency. Essential for technical analysis, price action patterns, and market trend identification. Uses continuous contracts for accurate historical analysis.

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: End time in milliseconds since epoch (defaults to current time if not specified)
